titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Whereas the infection of the plague and pestilence doth at this present remaine and continue within the cities of London and Westminster ...
Proclamations. 1563-09-21
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Church yarde by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: A proclamation adjourning Michaelmas term because of plague.
Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
